name: http://linksys.com/jnap/ddns/DDNS
desc: This service provides access to a device's DDNS settings.

GetDDNSSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/ddns/GetDDNSSettings
GetDDNSSettings.desc: This action gets the device's current DDNS settings.

dynDNSSettings.desc: The current DynDNS provider settings. This value will be present if and only if the value of the ddnsProvider parameter is DynDNS.

tzoSettings.desc: The current TZO provider settings. This value will be present if and only if the value of the ddnsProvider parameter is TZO.

GetDDNSStatus.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/ddns/GetDDNSStatus
GetDDNSStatus.desc: This action gets the device's current DDNS status.

SetDDNSSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/ddns/SetDDNSSettings
SetDDNSSettings.desc: This action sets the devices's DDNS settings.

dynDNSSettings.desc: The current DynDNS provider settings. This value must be present if and only if the value of the ddnsProvider parameter is DynDNS.

tzoSettings.desc: The current TZO provider settings. This value must be present if and only if the value of the ddnsProvider parameter is TZO.

errors.ErrorInvalidHostName: The specified host name or mail exchange host name was invalid.
errors.ErrorMissingDynDNSSettings: The DDNS provider was specified as DynDNS, but no DynDNS settings were specified.
errors.ErrorMissingMailExchangeSettings: Mail exchange was specified as enabled, but no mail exchange settings were specified.
errors.ErrorMissingTZOSettings: The DDNS provider was specified as TZO, but no TZO settings were specified.
errors.ErrorSuperfluousDynDNSSettings: DynDNS settings were specified even though the specified DDNS provider was not DynDNS.
errors.ErrorSuperfluousMailExchangeSettings: Mail exchange settings were specified even though mail exchange was specified as disabled.
errors.ErrorSuperfluousTZOSettings: TZO settings were specified even though the specified DDNS provider was not TZO.

username.desc: The username of the DynDNS account. This value cannot be an empty string.

password.desc: The password of the DynDNS account. This value cannot be an empty string.

hostName.desc: The DNS host name that is mapped to the device.

isWildcardEnabled.desc: Whether *.hostname is mapped to the device.

isMailExchangeEnabled.desc: Whether DynDNS also maps a mail exchange hostname.

mailExchangeSettings.desc: The DynDNS mail exchange settings. This member must be present if and only if the value of the isMailExchangeEnabled member is true.

hostName.desc: The mail exchange host name. This value cannot be an empty string.

isBackup.desc: Whether the mail exchange is a backup MX. If this value is false, the mail exchange is the primary mail relay.

username.desc: The username of the TZO account. This value cannot be an empty string.

password.desc: The password of the TZO account. This value cannot be an empty string.

hostName.desc: The DNS host name that is mapped to the device.
